content: Janam: - balaheenarum paapikallumaaya nyangalludemel anu grahangallum karunayum randu lokangallilum ennume nnekkum choriyappedumaaraakaname. Aammeen.

items.content: Urakkamillaattha unarvvallllavanaaya ente kartthaa ve! Ninte unarvvine sthothram cheyyuvaanaayittu paapa muzhukalil ninnu nyangallude urakkatthe unartthaname. Maranamillaattha jeevanullllavane! Ninte karunaye vandi ppaanaayi maranavum naashavumaakunna urakkatthil ninnu nyangallude maranatthe nee jeevippikkaname. Pithaavum puthranum parishuddharoohaayume! Svargatthilum bhoomiyilum sthuthikkappettavanum vaazhtthappettavanum nee aakayaal ninne sthuthikkunnavaraaya svargeeyamaalaakhamaarude maha tthvamulllla vrndangallodorumichu vishuddhiyodukoodi ippozhum eppozhum ennekkum ninne sthuthichu vaazhtthuvaan nyangalle yogyaraakkaname. Aammeen.

content:
1. Nammude rakshakanaa kabareennuyir‍ poondi
Ngettoru raavilnaamellaarumurakkamunar-
Nnonnaayu sthuthi paadeedenam.

2. Nyaayar divasamathil daivasuthan kabarin
Ulllleennettu - sthuthi sakalaadhipanennevam
Sabhayum makkallumaarkkunnu.

3. Moonnaam naall mrtharee-nnuyir poondattavanaam
Mashihaa paapa-kkuzhiyil ninnum maranatthil
Ninnum nyangalle ettenam.

4. Yaunaan than saadya-shyam pol muppakalum
Raavum bhoovi-nnull mevi thaan moonnaam naall
Jeevichuyirtthezhunnettu.

5. Jayaveeryatthodaa- kabareennettavanaam
Aprathyakshan - thannaadyantaviheena sutha-
Nnaayi sthuthi naamettenam.

/Tnyangallude kartthaave! Nyangallodu karuna cheyyaname. Nyangallude kartthaave! Krpayundaayi nyangallodu karuna cheyyaname. Nyangallude kartthaave! Uttharamarullicheythu nyangallodu karuna cheyyaname. Nyangallude kartthaave! Ninakku sthuthi. Nyangallude kartthaave! Ninakku sthuthi. Ennekkum nyangallude sharanavume ninakku sthuthi. Baarekmor.

Vinnulakinnarachanthaan than sabhaye panithathine
aakki thannaasthhaanam pukkathinulllla vaanu.
Kartthaa thannodu samsaa-rikkendunnavarellaam
sabhayullpukatteyithaa - thaanathil meveedunnu.
Haaleluyyaa u haaleluyyaa sabhaye vallartthunnavane
/tkrpa cheytheedadiyaaril.

Mashihaathan manavaatti - aayeedum shuddhasabha
Bhaagyangall poornnamathaam - parudeesaa sadrshamaho.
Maamodeesaayumathil - sahader thannasthhikallum
Poojaapeedhavumundu - enti jeevoshadhiye
Haaleluyyaa u haaleluyyaa bhaagam cheythekeedum
/tkahanenmaarkallumund.

Rakshaakarane ninte mukham kaanmathinu virodhikkalle,
/tninnuththhaanam ka-ndaasthreevargattho-
Dadiyaar manavarayullllil pu-kkaanandippaaraakenam.

Shaapappetta yoodanmaar - aanikall veekkiya thrkkaikall
/tkadamaakum kadalinnadiyaare ketti
Nindyatthinmakkupthatthil - ninningu valicheedenam

Chintappetta nin raktham nyangade karakall thudachellaam
/tnin thirumeni poru-ppichee punnukalle .
Skeeppaamel veraaya ni-nnuyiradiyaare cherkkenam.

1. Uththhaanatthaal than sabhaye veendonaam puthraa!
Nin shaino nalki than prajaye kaakkenam nee.

2. Doothavyooham mannanu maanam nalkaanetthi
Gabreeyelyar rakshakasavidham kaahallamoothi.

3. Thiruvullllatthaal nidraavashanaayezhunnettonaam
Unarvvallllone kaanaan vaanavavrndam thaanu.

4. Nyangallkkaayi peedaamaranam kaikkondettam
Deepthyaa jeevan praapichone, sthothramaroopee

5. Thaathan roohaa ennivaroppam rakshaka! Ninne
Jeevipporum mrtharum vaazhtthum krpa cheyyenam.

6. Vin man lokarkkaikyam nalkeedum shaino nin
Uththhaanatthaal nin sabhayil shaino nalkenam.

/Tnyangallude kartthaave! Nyangallodu karuna cheyyaname. Nyangallude kartthaave! Krpayundaayi nyangallodu karuna cheyyaname. Nyangallude kartthaave! Uttharamarullicheythu nyangallodu karuna cheyyaname. Nyangallude kartthaave! Ninakku sthuthi. Nyangallude kartthaave! Ninakku sthuthi. Ennekkum nyangallude sharanavume ninakku sthuthi. Baarekmor.

Krooshil thookki-chaa sehaane nee-
/tkkiya mashihaa sthuthyan
/tsabhaye otthu vivaaham thaan
/tsabha thanne sthuthi cheythettam
Etthi jaathikallellaa de-shattheennum sthuthi paadi than
Uththhaanatthil modikkunnu.

Vellllangkikkaa-raam prabha poondore
/t kabarinadukkal kaa-
/tvalkkaar kandittangodi
/tkandaalum mudrakkallaal
Moodiyavan kabaril ningall minnalkkoppam nilkkunnu”
/tennum chollippukkurshlemil. Subtext: Moriyo raahemmelainu aadaarain.

Nyangall than kartthaave! Nee
Kaarunyam cheyu nyangall mel
Svaathantryam nyangallkkuththhaa
Natthaal thannonaam puthraa!

Ipperunnaallil kartthaave!
Tharanam nyangallkkullvenma
Sthuthi perunnaallkallkkeeshannum
Mudiyavaye choottunnonum.

/tshuddhikall naathhaa! Shuddhaa ni-
/tnnodu thaathannum roohaaykkum
/thaaleluyyaa paadaan nya-
/tngallkkekeedenam shuddhi.

Nyangall than kartthaave! Nee
Kaarunyam cheyu nyangallmel
Svaathantryam nyangallkkuththhaa-
Natthaal thannonaam puthraa!

/tadiyaare uththhaanatthaal
/trakshichonaam mashihaa! Nee
/tnalkeedenam punyam nya-
/tngallkkum vaangippoyorkkum.

Kartthaave! Nalkaashvaasam nin salbhavanangallkkullllil
/tvaangippoyorkkaayu krpayee nyangallkkum
Adiyaarkkumavarkkum pattum - kuttangall maatteedenam.

/Tnyangallude kartthaave! Nyangallodu karuna cheyyaname. Nyangallude kartthaave! Krpayundaayi nyangallodu karuna cheyyaname. Nyangallude kartthaave! Uttharamarullicheythu nyangallodu karuna cheyyaname. Nyangallude kartthaave! Ninakku sthuthi. Nyangallude kartthaave! Ninakku sthuthi. Ennekkum nyangallude sharanavume ninakku sthuthi. Baarekmor.

/Tkartthaave aashvaasam nalku
Uththhaanatthin naallollam - thaalkkaalikamaamee jeevan-
Vitta pithaakkallkkum - bhraathyajanangallkkum
Kaantiyezhunnarakallkkullllil nalkeedaashvaasam
Avare orkkum naall kabaru-llllasthhikallariyenam
/tnin kalpana manmayaraamaa-
/tdaamyarkkuyirekidumpoll
Kaantiyaninyittavar ninno-doppam manavarayil pooki
Uyirekum ninne - sthothram cheyyenam.

Aarkkaayu kaazhchakallivideyana-ykkunno bhaagyamavannettam
Mel svargatthilava - nnormmayathundaakum.
Gothrapperukallormmaykkaayu - kartthaavin mumpil
kaanmaan kallukallil mooshaa - kotthiyathorkkumpoll
/tningall than mrtharperukalle
/torkkaanum palllliyilivide
Ezhuthaanum, melsvargatthil mashihaathan varavil thanno-
Davar modippaanum - cherppin pristthaayil.

1. Karuna niranyavane! Punaruththhaanatthil
Ninnude srshttiye nee puthuthaakkeedaname.

2. Ninnil sharanatthaal nidrayilaayu ninte
Varavinu kaattheedum mrtharil kaniyaname.

4. Vannavanaam varuvonum mrthar thannuyirum
Sthuthanennu shareeraathmaakkall paadaname.
